```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
pacman::p_load('ggplot2', 'plotly')
```

#look at year, state, pesticide, carcinogen, bee toxin
what pesticides do each state use and how toxic are they?


```{r}
Plot <- ggplot(strawbPesti) + geom_point(aes (x= State, y= `Chemical Name`, color= Carcinogen)) + labs(title= 'How Toxic are the chemicals on strawberries?')
ggplotly(Plot)
```
